title: Service Representative

**Position Summary**

The Member Service Representative will provide broad operational and administrative support across the organization. This includes delivering exceptional member service and assisting with daily office functions such as answering phones, processing forms, managing mailings, entering data, drafting correspondence, and maintaining organized files.

We offer a competitive benefits package including health, dental and vision, 401(k), long\\-term disability and term life insurance. Qualified candidates, please submit resume with cover letter and references.

title: Sales Representative/Customer Service
description:
**Miami Five Gallons Water** is looking for Sales Representative/Customer Service to join our team.

There are two shifts to chose from

Morning Shift: 9am to 2pm

Evening Shift: 4pm to 9pm

**POSITION SUMMARY**

Whenever a new distribution center its opened in at a zip code, Sales Representative/Customer Service will be tasked with creating brand and product awareness with the community as well as engage with all residents and convert them into customers.

The objective is to create new water delivery monthly subscriptions.

Duties will include reaching out to potential clients via face to face. Additionally, these Sales Representative/Customer Service will be tasked with canvassing the surrounding neighborhood and speaking with potential customers via door\\-knocking. Previous experience working within a sales environment is highly preferred. Being passionate about access to clean water is a must!

**ABOUT Miami Five Gallons Water**

We facilitate the sale of water delivery monthly subscriptions and water systems to help families and homeowners across the country gain access to truly pure water. We are looking for growth\\-oriented individuals who are looking to help us dominate multiple new markets. Our core values are the backbone of our business and guide our hiring process: we value excellence, passion, and community.

**OBJECTIVES**

* Maximize sales opportunities by meeting in\\-person with potential customers (door\\-to\\-door in the community)
* Represent **Miami Five Gallons Water** professionally by increasing brand awareness and becoming an expert in our industry.
* Ensure a positive and high\\-quality customer experience throughout all interactions.
* Meet or exceed individual and team sales goals.
* Meet monthly/quarterly sales targets
* Be a contributing member of the team in revenue, culture, and brand image.
* Attend and participate in internal meetings and complete required training.
* Performs other related duties as assigned by management.

**COMPETENCIES**

* Experience utilizing Microsoft Excel is preferred.
* One to three years of door\\-knocking experience related to sales is preferred.
* Ability to identify and resolve problems in a timely manner; gather and analyze information skillfully; develop alternative solutions; work well in group problem\\-solving situations.
* Adaptable to changes in the work environment; manage competing demands; changes approach or method to best fit the situation; able to deal with frequent change, delays, or unexpected events.
* Inspire the trust of others; work with integrity and ethically; uphold organizational values.
* Displays willingness to make decisions; exhibits sound and accurate judgment; support and explain reasoning for decisions.
* Demonstrates persistence and overcomes obstacles, measure self against standard of excellence.
* Passionate about access to clean water is a must.

**EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE**

* GED or High School diploma preferred.
* Some experience working within a sales environment is a must.

**PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS**

* Must have a valid driver’s license and a reliable vehicle
* Comfortable with prolonged periods of standing (door\\-to\\-door knocking)

Job Types: Full\\-time, Part\\-time

Pay: Up to $1,600\\.00 per week

Benefits:

* Flexible schedule

* another language (Preferred)

title: Customer Representative
description:
The Center Associate is responsible to deliver world\\-class customer service to all retail customers.
